name: chimera-slack-notification
description: Serverless Framework Python SQS Producer-Consumer on AWS

scripts.deploy: export AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG=1 && rm -rf ./.serverless-docker && docker build -t chimera-slack-notification-lambda . && docker create --name chimera-slack-notification chimera-slack-notification-lambda && docker cp chimera-slack-notification:/app/.serverless-docker ./ && docker rm chimera-slack-notification && sls deploy -p .serverless-docker
